text: "Body Language" (printed as "Body Language ↑⬱") is a 1982 song by Queen and taken from their 10th studio album Hot Space. It was the first music video to be banned by MTV. It went to number 3 in Canada and Poland, number 5 in Finland, number 6 in the Netherlands, number 10 in Sweden, number 11 in the United States, number 13 in Italy and number 19 in New Zealand. It stalled at number 25 in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Funk songs
title: Body Language (Queen song)
